product_name: Lezyne Alloy Digital Drive Floor Pump
long_description: Equipped with a very accurate digital gauge that's easy to read, the Lezyne Alloy Digital Drive Floor Drive pump optimizes tire pressure with great looks and durable CNC-machined construction.
short_description: Equipped with a very accurate digital gauge that's easy to read, the Lezyne Alloy Digital Drive Floor Drive pump optimizes tire pressure with great looks and durable CNC-machined construction.
